grub pa med de/ rmi lam ni pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung

chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa legs par mi shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshogs sam/ gzugs kyi tshogs su mngon par zhen pas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa 'am/ bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo ste/ de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor

bar dong / 'dong / 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thag ring / de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang thag ring ngo / /rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam

lta bu'o zhes bshad pa legs par shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro bar mi rtog go /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to/ /

de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob ma ste/ grong khyer gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za'o/ /de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen

po'i rin po che rnams ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / mtshams rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge

ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus rgya mtsho chen por rin po che rnams 'byung ste/ de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa/ rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ngo / /rin po che de dag med par 'gyur ba na yang phyogs bcu gang du

yang mi 'pho ste dong ba med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las/ rin po che de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams med par gyur pa las rin po che de rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin

du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang mi bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin gyi sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su

rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rag lus pa rgyu las kun du byung ba sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang ste/ phyogs bcu gang na yang yod pa ni ma yin gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las sku yongs

su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen de rnams med pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pi wang gi sgra 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro gang du yang 'pho ba med

la/ rten cing yang 'byung ba rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ pi wang gi khog pa dang / pags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud dang blang ba dang sbreng shing dang mi'i rtsol ba la rten nas pi wang gi sgra 'byung ste/ sgra de yang

khog pa las kyang ma byung / pags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud rnams dang / sbreng shing las kyang ma byung / blang ba dang / mi'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad 'dus shing ldan pa las sgra 'byung ngo / /'gag pa na yang

sgra de gang du yang mi 'gro/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa yang / rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /rgyu gcig las ma byung / rkyen gcig

las ma byung / dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba ma yin no/ /rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/ rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshogs pa las byung ba de gang nas kyang ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med na yang gang du yang mi bzhud do/ /

rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi/ chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /

chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par rab tu shes na/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la yang nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu

g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul to/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang 'khrugs/ nyams par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rtsi shing dang /

sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams kyang byung bar gyur/

steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bab par gyur/ rnga'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang steng gi bar snang las grags par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la/ lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dang / phye ma gzhan dag gis kyang gtor/ mngon par gtor/ rab

tu mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yon tan gyis deng bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba/ 'jig tshogs la gnas pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyis ma yin pa bshad pa thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so/ /sa

chen po 'di g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin/ rkyen gang yin/ chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa med pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bshad pa 'di khyod kyis dris/ ngas bshad pa na/

srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur/ bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ srog chags stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ rdul med cing dri ma med par gyur

nas/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa'i chos bshad pa 'di yongs su dris pa las/ sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni de nyid kyis chog gi /da phyin chad ni bdag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i the tshom mi 'byung / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su

'gyur ba la dogs pa med do snyam nas de dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la gnas te/ 'di snyam du

bdag 'di ltar bar snang la 'dug pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la cis mchod snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas de sems la yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes te/ lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag de la byin nas 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod me tog 'di dag gis 'phags

pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byos shig /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng sems can stong phrag mang po rnams kyi don byas par gyur pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod la nged kyis phan gdags

so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar spro bar byas pa de lta bur/ gang sems can thams cad kyi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de lta bu dag rab tu dkon no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog man dA ra ba dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa
la bdag gi lus kyis kyang bkab nas tshig 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod la deng phan chad g.yog bya ba'i phyir bdag gi lus kyang 'bul lo zhes nas/ de bar snang las babs te bdag phul nas/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /

rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag cag kyang 'di ltar lus 'bul lo/ /bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig /phyin chad kyang khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byed

par gyur cig /khyod dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad smras so/ /bu mo khyod snying nas nga'i bsam pa dang

'thun par byed cing / snying nas nga la lus 'bul na ni nga yang khyed len to/ /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag khyod la snying nas bsam pa dang 'thun par byed cing / khyod ci dgos pa bya ba'i phyir snying nas lus 'bul lo/ /de

nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de la pa bu mo lnga brgya rnams rgyan thams cad kyis klubs/ shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la phul te/ rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnams dang / shing rta lnga brgya po 'di rnams yongs su spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbul lo/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin

gyis rigs kyi bu de la rigs kyi bu legs so/ /legs so zhes nas/ legs pa byin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /gtong ba'i sems

de lta bu dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas

pa nyan nus par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gtong ba de lta bu la gnas nas/ bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun du bsgrubs/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa yang yongs su dris so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams dang / shing rta lnga brgya blangs so/ /blangs nas kyang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i

rigs kyi bu de nyid la slar byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa stan las langs nas bdag gi khyim du song ngo / /nyi ma yang nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba ni legs pa ma yin la/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa bdag gi
khyim nas chos 'chad pa'i phyir ma byung gi bar du 'greng ba 'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis bsdad do snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ /chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun du

snyoms par zhugs pa gcig la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa las byung ba stong phrag grangs med tshad med pa las gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rtag par rab tu ngu ba yang lo bdun du 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skyed/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / ro la chags pa mi skyed kyi/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos

kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi bu de gang la 'dug nas chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan bting bar bya na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di langs pa ji tsam na mthong snyam pa dang / sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'chad pa'i sa phyogs de yang phyag dar byas shing chag chag gis btab la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis kun du gtor to snyam pa las bsam pa

gzhan med do/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis po de nyid kyis sdod cing 'khod do/ /bya ba thams cad

kyang de dang rjes su 'thun par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ste/ langs nas kyang grong khyer gyi dbus su chos 'chad do/ /zhes zer ba'i sgra nam mkha' las

byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas sgra de thos nas/ dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba

skyes par gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po rnams dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de byi dor byas nas/ chos kyi stan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yang bting ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la pa bu mo lnga brgya po

thams cad kyis bdag cag gi bla gos lus las phud de stan gang la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'dug ste/ chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan der bla gos lnga brgya stan du bting ngo / /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/ sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i phyir kho ra khor yug tu chu btsal na/ sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i chu bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par

rab tu ngu ba chu ma rnyed nas/ sems la sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi dga' ba dang / sems gzhan du gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med par gyur cing / mchod pa de yang ngan par 'gyur ba de lta bur bya ba'i phyir/ chu de med pa byas pas

chu ma rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /'o na bdag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs 'di khrag gis chag chag gdab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/

rdul de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i lus la ma rung bar gyur na/ bdag gi lus nges par 'jig par 'gyur ba 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus don med par chud zos pa bas 'di ltar byas na bdag gi

lus med par gyur kyang bla'o/ /bdag gi lus stong phrag du ma 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i mtshan mar 'khor ba na yang dang yang du 'khor ba'i tshe/ chud zos kyi gnas 'di lta bu dag tu ni ma

song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te bdag gi lus kun phug nas/ sa phyogs de kun bdag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po

de rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob pas/ thams cad kyis mtshon rnon po blangs nas/ bdag cag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs de bdag cag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang / bu mo de rnams kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur te/ bdud sdig to can gyis dge ba'i phyogs la bar chad bya ba'i skabs rnyed par yang ma gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin

'di snyam du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di de ltar chos 'dod pa dang / de ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang / go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir lus

dang srog la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas 'di ltar sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las yongs su thar bar bya bar sems pa

de ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs so/ /sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug kyang / lha'i tsan dan gyi chu'i dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tshad brgya'i bar du bsang bar byas so/ /de

nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / khyod chos 'dod pa dang / chos tshol ba bla na med pa de

legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / brtson 'grus de lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi stan ni bting zin/ sa

phyogs 'di yang chag chag btab cing phyag dar byas zin na/ sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog gis gtor ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos 'chad pa la gtor ba'i me tog bdag gis ga las rnyed snyam pa

dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man dA ra ba 'di rnams khyer la/ 'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di khyod kyis me tog gis gtor

cig/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan la 'dug cing / chos 'chad pa la yang gtor cig ces nas/ des lha'i me tog man dA ra ba khal bzhi brgya de la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab

tu ngu bas me tog de dag blangs nas/ me tog de dag kha cig ni sa phyogs der gtor/ me tog kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags

pa lo bdun lon pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ chos kyi stan gang na 'dug pa der song nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor/ mdun du byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa 'chad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog gis mchod pa byas so/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa mthong nas dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa yid la byed pa rtse gcig tu gyur pa de

lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam

pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par dben pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par dben no/ /chos thams cad mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi g.yo ba nyid do/ /chos thams cad sems pa med pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sems pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mnan pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnan pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/ /

chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /ri rab lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs

pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid do/ /gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha'

yas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha'

yas pa nyid do/ /rdo rje lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'jig pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad dmigs

su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin

du 'dug pa las/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nges par byed do/ /chos thams cad rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos

thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

chos thams cad mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba

dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang

rnam pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bshad pa na rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag drug cu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas rab tu thob par gyur to/ /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo

brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / mtshams rnams dang / bla 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / tshig 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa mthong ba ni/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nga byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang /

tshig 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'chad cing 'dug pa lta bu'o/ /de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /tshe rabs thams cad du yang nams kyang sangs rgyas dang mi

'bral bar gyur to/ /tshe rabs thams cad du gang dang gang du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum du chos nyan to/ /chung ngu na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas

mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo/ /de mi khom pa thams cad spangs shing dal 'byor dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o/ /de bas na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la yang rgyas par ston cig/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ bsgrags par bya/ bstan par bya/ bshad par bya/ kha ton du bya/ rab tu bsgom par bya ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis chung ngu na/ glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal bar bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor

yug tu yang mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa du mas mchod cing / rim gror bya/ bla mar bya/ bsti stang du bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gus par bya ste/ 'di ni ngas rjes su gdams pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi

ston pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/ khyod kyis yongs

su spyad do/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i dag gi las yid du 'ong zhing yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las yid du 'ong zhing yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin

pas yongs su spyad do/ /de bas na kun dga' bo nga da ltar lus 'di la gnas shing 'tsho skyong ba na/ gang khyod kyis byams pa dang dga' ba dang / bla mar byas pa de/ da 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gyis shig /kun dga'

bo khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du gtad cing rjes su gtad kyis/ khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di med par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig /kun dga' bo ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du de

bzhin gshegs pa yang bzhugs par rig par bya/ de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub

par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rim gror byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / gus par byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang /

phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pas mchod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong

ba dang mi 'bral ba/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bar 'khod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs dgyes pas de skad bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab

'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa re ba ta

dang / tshe dang ldan pa rA hu la dang / 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/

yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas

dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum rdzogs // //nyi khri 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen myang sgom chos 'bar gyi thugs dam gser khri la phyi mo byas nas zhus dag lan gnyis dang / nyi khri yer pa ma'i steng nas

zhus dag legs par bgyis bdog pas/ slan chad bri ba rnams kyang 'di kho na bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /zhes ma phyi 'jang par las byung zhing / slob dpon seng ge bzang pos zhus dag mdzad pa'i nyi khri dang dpe la lar chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o zhes pa yan las mi 'dug /'di'i phyi mo sogs dpe la lar de'i

steng du/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la rab tu phye ba'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po thob pa'i le'u/ rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u/ chos 'phags kyi le'u/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug 'dug pa sngon gyi lo rgyus dang gsan yig khungs ma rnams dang mthun 'on

kyang le'u phyi ma lnga po 'di 'gyur khyad lta bu'i don la khyad med kyang tshig cung zad mi 'dra ba'i dpe gsum tsam mthong / lar dpe 'di nyid kyi dbu zhabs thams cad du gzhan dang tshig zur mi 'dra ba dang tshig sna ring thung ci rigs pa 'dug /khyad par gleng gzhi'i skabs tshig sna 'ga' zhig 'bum dang mthun par snang ngo // //

@#/ /oM swa sti/ /lha dbang dbang po sogs kyis gus bsten pa'i/ /mi mchog mchog gi rnam 'dren sku gsum bdag /rnam grol grol ba'i lam dang tshogs kyi mchog /ma lus lus can mgon rnams phyag gi yul/ /stong dang snying rje dbyer med lha lam ngos/ /phrin las chu 'dzin 'thug po 'khrigs pa las/ /

phan dang bde ba'i bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa'i/ /sras bcas rgyal bas slar yang dge legs sa stsol/ /srid zhi'i rmad byung yon tan 'byung gnas mchog /mchog gyur legs gsungs dgos 'dod dbang gi rgyal/ /rgyal mtshan tog ltar mngon par mtho ba'i rten/ /rten mchog sangs rgyas bstan pa'i dpal du spel/ /

gang gang dman mchog gdul bya'i bye brag gis/ /mang mang theg pa'i rim pa mtha' yas kyang / /nges nges sde snod gsum du 'du ba las/ /zab zab bar pa mtshan nyid med pa'i bka'/ /dri za'i yul bzhugs bye ba phrag brgya pa/ /mchod sbyin brgya pa'i gnas bzhugs 'bum phrag brgya/ /gdengs can grong

bzhugs stong phrag brgya pa la/ /rgyas pa'i rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i rnam gzhag mdzad/ /nyi khri khri brgyad stong pa shes rab khri/ /'bring gi rgyas 'bring bsdus pa zhes su grags/ /brgyad stong pa dang sdud pa tshigs bcad la/ /bsdus dang shin tu bsdus zhes mkhas mang bzhed/ /yang na 'bum dang nyi khri brgyad stong

pa/ /rgyas 'bring bsdus par yongs su grags pa las/ /rgyas pa ris med 'gro ba'i mchod sdong du/ /'dzad med dbang gi rgyal po'i char phabs nas/ /slar yang bstan 'gro'i dge legs spel ba'i ched/ /stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i rin chen dbyig /zad mi shes pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgo/ /

grangs med gcig char 'byed pa'i ngo mtshar dpyid/ /yangs pa'i sde chen dge bcu'i 'tsho ba la/ /longs su spyod pa'i skal bzang stsol ba'i rje/ /ris med bstan pa yongs kyi sri zhu mkhan/ /tshe ring dbang po'i khengs pa 'phrog byed des/ /dpal ldan sa skya'i ring lugs

gdugs dkar gyis/ /yongs su khyab pa'i lugs gnyis mdun sa che/ /phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi grwa/ /lhun grub steng gi pho brang chen po ru/ /dge byed chu stag shel dkar dngas pa'i ngos/ /snron zla'i gzhon nu'i bzhin ras 'char ba'i tshe/ /rko byed rtser son bcu phrag nyer lnga yis/ /

legs tshogs rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pas bsgrubs/ /dge des mi dbang sku tshe chab srid bstan/ /yangs pa'i rgyal khams rdzogs ldan bde bas 'tsho/ /'brel thob gyis mtshon mar gyur 'gro ba rnams/ /rnam grol sku bzhi'i go 'phang thob phyir bsngo/ /zhes sde dge sa skyong

mi'i dbang po bstan pa tshe ring gi zhal snga nas sangs rgyas phal po che dang 'di nyid stabs gcig tu par du bsgrubs pa gnang skabs/ go re len dge slong bkra shis dbang phyug gis par gyi las gra tshugs pa'i gnas shar kha rdzong gsar pho brang du bris pa dza yan+tu// //ye d+har+m+mA he tu pra b+ha wA
he tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya wa data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI mahA shram NaH/ // // //
